entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
